metadata.title: CVE-2019-16396 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
GnuCOBOL 2.2 has a use-after-free in the end_scope_of_program_name() function in cobc/parser.y via crafted COBOL source code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-16396` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnucobol - 4.0~early~20200606-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnucobol package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0~early~20200606-3').
